title: Google's Bard AI bot mistake wipes $100bn off shares
description: An advert to promote the new Bard software shows it answering a query incorrectly.

title: Netflix limits account sharing in four more countries
description: New rules are being introduced in Canada, New Zealand, Portugal and Spain, before further roll out.

title: NFT images of furry Birkin bags violated trademark rules
description: Hermes, which owns the brand, has won a landmark case against an artist who created NFTs of the famous bag.
